heading: Court Calendar
body_text: Mark dates of hearing. Review tomorrow's cases. Get hearing alerts.

heading: Case Files
body_text: View all your Case Files online. Keep records updated. And upload new ones.

heading: Sample Contracts
body_text: Library of draft contracts. You can also add your own!

heading: Sample Pleadings
body_text: Library of draft pleadings. You can also add your own!

heading: Frequently Asked Legal Questions
body_text: Some frequently asked questions answered by law experts.

heading: Criminal Law Guru
body_text: Fastest way to research Pakistani criminal law. Try it!

heading: Limitation Calculator
body_text: Calculate the last date of filling for various categories of cases. A taste of the world of AI lawyering.

heading: Corporate Law Guru - coming soon!
body_text: Step-by-step guide for getting corporate registrations, drafting corporate documents and archiving them.

heading: Transaction Calculator - coming soon!
body_text: Calculate the stamp duty and registration fee payable on various kinds of business transaction.

body_text: Generate invoices and keep track of them.
